title: Aishwarya Rai is on a roll
text: Deccan Chronicle | Subhash K. Jha | October 23, 2015, 23.14 pm Aishwarya Rai Bachchan After her comeback film Jazbaa, about to be followed up with Karan Johar’s Ae Dil Hai Mushkil, for which she’s currently shooting in London, followed by Omung Kumar’s biopic Sarabjit, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan will be doing two back-to-back films with director Sujoy Ghosh. The director has been closely associated with the Bachchan parivar since the start of his career. Confirming the news, Aishwarya says, “I’ve agreed to do Sujoy’s Durga Rani and the screen adaptation of Keigo Huganshino’s Japanese novel The Devotion Of Suspect X. I don’t know which one he will start first. We are working on that.” Ghosh had worked with Amitabh Bachchan in his second feature film, Alladin, and with Abhishek Bachchan in his third film Home Delivery. Aishwarya says, “I’ve known Sujoy from the time he made his first film Jhankar Beats. He has been offering me films since then. I loved the two films that he offered me now. So I immediately said yes.” Bollywood Jazbaa Ae Dil Hai Mushkil Aishwarya Rai Also Read SRK and Kajol only get younger in these new 'Dilwale' set pics Promotion of 'Purani Jeans' Boney Kapoor survives a horrible crash on his way to Wai Why is Sridevi hiding her face?
